meanings.definition: To drink (a liquid) quickly and in large quantities.
meanings.sent1: She chugalugged her juice after playing outside.
meanings.sent2: He chugalugged the water bottle after his run.
meanings.sent3: The thirsty dog chugalugged the bowl of water in one go.
meanings.sent4: The car chugalugged the gasoline as it raced down the highway.
meanings.sent5: The kids chugalugged the lemonade at the picnic, leaving none for others.

meanings.definition: Past tense of chugalug: drank (a liquid) quickly and in large quantities.
meanings.sent1: They chugalugged the soda at the party last night.
meanings.sent2: She chugalugged the milkshake before it melted.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon chugalugged the leftover soda cans from the trash.
meanings.sent4: The old car chugalugged the gas as it struggled up the hill.
meanings.sent5: The students chugalugged the energy drinks before the exam, hoping to stay awake.
